availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Cartwright (Adair County, Kentucky, farm laborer and Second Lieutenant (U.S.A.) )

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John Cartwright and Nancy Cartwright. Farm laborer in Adair County, Kentucky in 1860. Mustered in as Second Lieutenant 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) in December 23, 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, p. 57.Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 354. KYR-0002-222-0139.
